tag_list: user-experience, internet-marketing, social-media, mobile-web, online-presence, digital-presence, coach
overview:
James Watson has been working in the online space for the past 8 years, and has managed projects and developed applications for Webs.com, Gap.com, Warner Brother’s Records, Yoga Journal.com, and more. Prior to 2003, he was a geneticist working for Genetic Therapy, Inc., a subsidiary of Novartis.

James is an entrepreneur who is passionate about the way people interact with one another through emerging social applications in the online and mobile space.

James is also a writer, artist, photographer, coffee shop philosopher, and traveler. He returned from a 10 month tour around the world in 2010. Specialties

user experience architecture, user interface design, social media, mobile applications, customer engaging and interactive marketing

image.attribution: James Watson Internet Marketing and User Experience
